def cr(x, y, z):
    g = x - 1
    h = y - g
    i = h * z
    print(i)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    input_values = input().split()
    if len(input_values) != 3:
        print('Invalid input for test case', i + 1)
        continue
    (P, M, V) = map(int, input_values)
    if not (1 <= P <= 5 and 6 <= M <= 56 and (1 <= V <= 100)):
        print('Invalid input for test case', i + 1)
        continue
    fuel_economy = M - (P - 1)
    max_distance = fuel_economy * V
    print(max_distance)
